# psr-container

## Description

Common Container Interface ([PHP FIG][2] [PSR-11][3]).

## Requirements

 * node: 10

## Installation

Through [NPM](https://www.npmjs.com) as [psr-container][1].

```sh
npm i psr-container@1.0
```

PHP:
